mapper.select: SELECT A.TABLE_NAME , B.COLUMN_NAME , B.DATA_TYPE , B.DATA_LENGTH FROM USER_TABLES A , USER_TAB_COLUMNS B WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.TABLE_NAME LIKE #{tableName}
